articles.title: The cockroach cadre: Argentina’s tough, resilient coaches are the toast of football

articles.content: When Uruguay appointed Marcelo Bielsa as coach in May, they joined a growing club. Lionel Scaloni led Argentina to glory at the World Cup. Chile are managed by Eduardo Berizzo. Paraguay are managed by Guillermo Barros Schelotto. Bolivia are managed b... [6791 chars]

articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Flying from Florida to Buenos Aires usually takes about 10 hours, but the turboprop landing in Argentina on Saturday wa...
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Flying from Florida to Buenos Aires usually takes about 10 hours, but the turboprop landing in Argentina on Saturday was no normal plane. It had been en route for 20 days, and many Argentines eagerly refreshed flight tr... [5751 chars]

articles.description: As Argentina's dollar reserve falls to its lowest level since 2016, companies in the nation are turning towards the yuan to purchase imports.

articles.title: Argentina political drama heats as election battle lines drawn
articles.description: Argentina's presidential election battle lines have hardened after economy minister Sergio Massa entered the race in a dramatic late twist to take on front runners including a conservative city mayor, ex-security czar and libertarian economist.

articles.title: Argentina's Yuan Use Soars As Greenbacks Run Short
articles.description: As Argentina's dollar reserve falls to its lowest level since 2016, companies in the nation are turning towards the yuan to purchase imports.
articles.content:
Argentine companies are increasingly turning to China's yuan amid dollar shortages, Bloomberg reports.
US giant Whirlpool is also considering use of the yuan to buy parts for a factory in Argentina.
